name: IRON ALCHEMIST
description:
GAME NOT FINISHED, DON'T WORRY IF YOU FIND BUGS.  THANKS

the old alchemist FROSTER, made a ritual where he summoned a mystical creature CRAVELE, the king of gold.

the old man managed to evoke the same, however, CRAVELE did not come alone, he brought creatures from the depths that dominated FROSTER's castle.

FROSTER was attacked by the creatures, almost to death, he transferred his soul into bronze armor.

Now he seeks to retake his castle from CRAVELE's hands.

CONTROLS

LEFT (A)

RIGHT (D)

JUMP  (O)

ATTACK (K)

MAP (SPACE)
